text: If you never venture, you will never win.
All things are difficult before they are easy.
Education breeds confidence, confidence breeds hope, hope breeds peace.
Peace and tranquility are worth a thousand gold pieces.

If there is harmony in one's house, there will be order in the nation. If there is order in the nation, there will be peace in the world.	true
